welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Bonita Springs! Get ready to experience the charm of our beautiful city, known for its stunning beaches, outdoor activities, and vibrant cultural scene. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring and enjoying all that Bonita Springs has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Southwest Florida International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Southwest Florida International Airport primarily serves domestic flights for Southwest Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Southwest Florida International Airport serves domestic flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal of Naples Airport, where all commercial flights operate from.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Page Field Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Page Field Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 2 hours.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Immokalee Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Immokalee Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Marco Island Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Marco Island Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
